items.content_html: Formique is a lightweight, declarative JavaScript syntax library for generating WCAG accessibility and usability compliant forms.
items.title: Gugulethu-Nyoni/formique: Formique is a lightweight, declarative JavaScript syntax library for generating WCAG accessibility and usability compliant forms.

items.content_html: A lightweight RAG for embedding and querying codebases. This service allows users to download GitHub repositories, process their code, store it in a vector database, and query it using natural language to retrieve relevant code snippets. Perfect for building intelligent code search and analysis tools.
items.title: hashir-ayaz/codebase-rag: A lightweight RAG for embedding and querying codebases. This service allows users to download GitHub repositories, process their code, store it in a vector database, and query it using natural language to retrieve relevant code snippets. Perfect for building intelligent code search and analysis tools.

items.content_html: X-UI is a lightweight, user-friendly web panel designed for managing Xray configurations. Ideal for personal use, it streamlines the process of managing server configurations, making it accessible for everyone.

items.content_html: Tiny Validation is a lightweight, chainable input validation library for Node.js. Validate strings, numbers, emails, and more with ease. Example: validate(input).isEmail().isNotEmpty(). No dependencies, simple API, and perfect for quick validation needs without the bloat. Stay minimal, stay efficient!
items.title: nodebysam/tinyvalidation: Tiny Validation is a lightweight, chainable input validation library for Node.js. Validate strings, numbers, emails, and more with ease. Example: validate(input).isEmail().isNotEmpty(). No dependencies, simple API, and perfect for quick validation needs without the bloat. Stay minimal, stay efficient!

items.content_html: BookSky is a lightweight, user-friendly web application for managing a collection of books. This project allows users to add, view, and delete books dynamically while saving their data in LocalStorage for persistent usage. With a modern and responsive design, it's perfect for anyone looking to organize their favorite reads effortlessly.
items.title: S-Poornesh/Book_Sky: BookSky is a lightweight, user-friendly web application for managing a collection of books. This project allows users to add, view, and delete books dynamically while saving their data in LocalStorage for persistent usage. With a modern and responsive design, it's perfect for anyone looking to organize their favorite reads effortlessly.
